product_name: Arc'teryx Fortrez Hoodie Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Arc'teryx Fortrez Hoodie is made from Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece. With four-way stretch and a durable, hardface fabric, you can wear it alone or layered underneath a shell jacket. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece with a hardface microprint finish resists wind, light rain and abrasion, plus breathes well and adds thermal warmth. Hood has an integrated neck gaiter that stows away or can function as a balaclava. Two hand pockets and one chest pocket. The Arc'teryx Fortrez hoodie has a trim fit.
